name: United States
summary: Anchor node for hemispheric flow. Provides corridor security capacity, financing depth, and operational standards for tier upgrades.
assets: Port, rail, and interstate logistics density
R&D ecosystem + compute capacity for modeling
pain_points: Infrastructure aging and grid modernization needs
Polar + Gulf + Pacific simultaneous defense load
notes: Baseline only. In production, users can adjust weights (e.g., climate risk severity, trade assumptions, enforcement intensity).
